project_descr: To Support ongoing national efforts, at strategic level, on gender transformation

outputs.output_descr: Support the South African government in its response to the HIV & AIDS epidemic.
donor_name: JOINT UNITED NATIONS PROGRAMME ON HIV/AIDS

outputs.output_descr: Supporting the mainstreaming of MDGs within provincial and local governments development planning processes

The purpose of this OUTPUT is to empower women to take a more active role in gender transformation initiatives. UNDP will assist to organise skills-based training programmes on enhancing the legislative and oversight role of women legislators and political leaders across all tiers of government. The training will focus on enabling women legislators to become more functional, effective and result-oriented, and strengthening skills for their oversight role. Further technical support will be given to empower women in monitoring and assessment of gender sensitivity to policies, programmes and budg

This OUTPUT focuses on support to institutionalize national, provincial, Local Municipality M&E and Community-based Outcome Monitoring System in the country to improve service delivery through promoting community participation, stakeholder partnership, transparency, and accountability. This will entails mainstreaming of M&E in the public sector planning processes.
Support the monitoring, review and reporting process of the implementation of the Paris Declaration
